text: Glinik Gorlice is a Polish football club based in Gorlice, Poland.https://www.footballdatabase.eu/en/club/team/9444-glinik_gorlice/0 ==Previous names== Glinik Gorlice has been known by many different names over time. *1921–1924 RKS Siła Gorlice *1924–1945 KS Karpatia Gorlice *1945–1948 KS Orzeł Gorlice *1948–1952 KS Związkowiec Gorlice *1952–1953 KS Unia Gorlice *1953–1965 MZKS Górnik Gorlice *1965–2001 GKS Glinik Gorlice *2001–2009 KS Glinik/Karpatia Gorlice *2009– GKS Glinik Gorlice == Honours & Achievements== *District League:Nowy Sącz: ::Winners: 2012-2013 *Polish Cup ::1/64
